explains: n. 平衡，协调；妥协，让步

sentences.en: There is a trade-off between the benefits of the drug and the risk of side effects.
sentences.cn: 在这种药的疗效和副作用之间有个权衡利弊的问题。

sentences.en: Evolution has repeatedly made this trade-off.
sentences.cn: 进化一再做出这种取舍。

sentences.en: In the past we had to have a taste trade-off.
sentences.cn: 在过去，我们必须在口味上有所取舍。
